snippet: KAMEN--Renee, on May 18, 2016. Age 93. Elegant, vivacious and wise, she is survived by her adoring husband Milton, loving daughter Peggy, devoted son Michael and dear nieces and nephews. A good life, well spent. Services were private. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAMEN--Renee, on May 18, 2016. Age 93. Elegant, vivacious and wise, she is survived by her adoring husband Milton, loving daughter Peggy, devoted son Michael and dear nieces and nephews. A good life, well spent. Services were private. 1/3
